Translations.Text: aliph - lam - ra'a. vedapustakattile athava, suvyaktamaya khur'anile vacanannalaniva
tannal muslinkalayirunnenkil enn satyanisedhikal keaticcupeakunna avasthayuntakum
avare ni vittekkuka. avar tinnum sukhiccum vyameahannalkkatippettum kaliyatte. vaikate avar ellam ariyum
niscitamaya avadhi nalkikkeantallate nam oru natineyum nasippiccittilla
oru samudayavum niscita avadhikkumump nasikkukayilla. avadhiyettiyal pinne pintikkukayumilla
satyanisedhikal parannu: "udbeadhanam irakkikkittiyavane, niyearu bhrantan tanne.”
ni satyavanenkil nannalute atutt malakkukale keantuvarattatent?”
ennal n'yayamaya avasyattinallate nam malakkukale irakkukayilla. irakkiyal pinne avarkk avasaram nalkukayumilla
tirccayayum naman i khur'an irakkiyat. nam tanne atine katturaksikkukayum ceyyum
ninakkumump purvikaraya pala vibhagannalilum nam dutanmare niyeagiccittunt
avarute atutt daivadutan cennappealellam avaraddehatte parihasikkatirunnittilla
avvidhaman nam kurravalikalute manas'sukalil nam parihasam katattivitunnat
ennittum avaratil visvasikkunnilla. purvikarum im'mattil tanneyayirunnu
namavarkk manattuninnearu vatil turannukeatuttuvenn vekkuka. annane avaratilute kayarippeayikkeantirikkunnuvennum
ennalppealum avar parayum: "nam'mute kannukalkk mayakkam badhiccatan. alla nam maranattinirayaya janamatre.”
akasattu nam rasikaluntakkiyirikkunnu. kanikalkk at alankrtamakkukayum ceytirikkunnu
sapikkappetta sakala pisacukkalilninnum namatine katturaksiccirikkunnu
kattukelkkunnavanil ninnealike. annane ceyyumpeal tiksnamaya jvala avane pintutarunnu
bhumiye nam visalamakki. atil malakale urappiccunirtti. atil nam nanataram vastukkal krtyamaya parimanatteate mulappiccu
namatil ninnalkk jivaneapadhikal untakkiveccirikkunnu. ninnal aharam keatukkattavaykkum
ellarrinreyum jiviteapadhikalute pattayam nam'mute vasaman. nitipurvam niscita teatil namatu irakkikkeatukkunnu
nam meghavahinikalaya karrine ayakkunnu. annane manattuninn vellamirakkunnu. nam ninnaleyat kutippikkunnu. ateannum sekhariccuvekkunnat ninnalallallea
tirccayayum naman jivippikkunnatum marippikkunnatum. ellarrineyum anantarametukkunnatum nam tanne
ninnalilninn neratte katannupeayavar arenn namukk nannayariyam. pirake varunnavararennum namariyunnu
nis'sansayam; ninre nathan avareyeakke orumiccukuttum. avan yuktimanum ellam ariyunnavanum tanne
niscayamayum manusyane nam, muttiyal mulannunna, gandhamulla karutta kalimannil ninnu srsticcu
atinumump jinnukale nam atyusnamulla tijjvalayilninn srsticcu
ninre nathan malakkukaleat paranna sandarbham: niscayamayum muttiyal mulannunna, gandhamulla, karutta kalimannil ninn nam manusyane srstikkan peavukayan
annane nanavane rupappetuttukayum enre atmavil ninn avanilutukayum ceytal ninnalellavarum avan pranamamarppikkunnavarayittiranam
annane malakkukaleakke pranamiccu
iblisealike. pranamamarppikkunnavareateappam ceran avan visam'maticcu
allahu ceadiccu: "pranamam ceytavareateappam ceratirikkan ninne prerippiccatent?”
iblis parannu: "muttiyal mulannunna, gandhamulla karutta kalimannil ninn ni srsticca manusyane pranamikkentavanalla nan.”
allahu kalpiccu: "enkil ni iviteninnirannippeavuka. ni bhrastanan
n'yayavidhiyute nalvare ninakku sapamuntayirikkum.”
avan parannu: "enre natha, avar uyirttelunnelkkunna nalvare enikk avadhi tannalum.”
allahu ariyiccu: "ninakk avasaram tannirikkunnu
niscitasamayam vannettunna dinanvare.”
avan parannu: "enre natha, ni enne valiketilakki. atepeale bhumiyil nanavarkk cittavrttikal ceteaharamayitteannippikkum. avareyeakke durmargattilakkukayum ceyyum; tircca
avarile ninre atmarthatayulla dasanmareyealike.”
allahu parannu: "itan ennilekkettanulla ner vali
enre atimakalute mel ninakkearu svadhinavumilla. ninne pintutarnna valipilaccavarilealike
tirccayayum narakaman avarkk vagdanam ceyyappetta itam.”
atin elu vatilukalunt. orea vatililuteyum pravesikkan avarilninn pratyekam vitikkappetta orea vibhagamunt
urappayum suksmata palikkunnavar svargiyaramannalilum aruvikalilumayirikkum
avareatu parayum: "nirbhayarayi samadhanatteate ninnalatil pravesiccukealluka.”
avarute hrdayannaliluntayekkavunna vidvesam nam nikkikkalayum. parasparam saheadarannalayi carukattilukalilavar abhimukhamayi irikkum
avite avare ksinam badhikkukayilla. aviteninnavar purantallappetukayumilla
nan ere pearukkunnavanum parama dayaluvumanenn enre dasanmare ariyikkuka
tirccayayum enre siksayan erram neaveriya siksayennum
ibrahiminre atithikalepparriyum ni avarkku parannukeatukkuka
avar addehattinre atuttucenna sandarbham: appeal avar parannu: "tankalkku samadhanam.” addeham parannu: "satyamayum nannalkku ninnalepparri petiteannunnu.”
avar parannu: "tankal petikkenta. jnanamulla oru putrane sambandhicca subhavartta nannalita tankale ariyikkunnu.”
addeham parannu: "i vayas'sukalattanea ninnalenne putrane sambandhicca subhavartta ariyikkunnat? entearu subhavarttayan ninnal i nalkunnat?”
avar parannu: "nannal tankalkku nalkunnat sariyaya subhavartta tanne. atinal tankal nirasanavatirikkuka.”
ibrahim parannu: "tanre nathanre anugrahattekkuricc aran nirasanavuka? valipilaccavarealike.”
ibrahim ceadiccu: "allayea dutanmare, ninnalute pradhana detyamentan?”
avar parannu: "kurravalikalaya oru janatayilekkan nannale niyeagiccirikkunnat.”
lutvinre kutumbam atil ninnealivan. avareyeakke nam raksappetuttum
addehattinre bharyaye olike. aval pintinilkkunnavarilayirikkumenn nam tirumaniccirikkunnu
annane a malakkukal lutvinre alukalute atukkalettiyappeal
addeham parannu: "ninnal aparicitaraya alukalanallea.”
avar parannu: "i janam sansayiccukeantirunna karyavumayan nannal vannirikkunnat
nannal satyavumayan tankalute atutt vannirikkunnat. tirccayayum nannal satyam parayunnavaran
atinal ravinre oru khandam matram bakkinilkke tankal kutumbatteyum kutti ivitam vituka. tankal avarute pinnil natakkanam. arum tirinnuneakkarut. avasyappetunnetattekk peavuka.”
athava, atutta prabhatatteate ikkuttarute muratu muriccumarrumenn nam addehatte khanditamayi ariyiccu
appealekkum nagaravasikal ahladabharitarayi vannetti
lutv parannu: "niscayamayum ivarenre virunnukaran. atinal ninnalenne vasalakkarute
allahuve ortt ninnalenne manakketilakkatirikkuka.”
avar parannu: "janannalute karyattilitapetarutenn ninne nannal vilakkiyirunnille?”
addeham parannu: "ninnal entenkilum ceyte atannu enkil ita ivar, enre penmakkal.”
ninre jivitaman satyam! avar tannalute lahariyil matimarann enteakkeyea ceyyukayan
prabhateadayatteate oru ghearagarjanam avare pitikuti
annane a natine nam kilmel mariccu. pinne nam cuttupalutta kallukal avarutemel viltti
karyannal vertiriccariyan kaliyunnavarkk tirccayayum itil dharalam telivukalunt
a nat innum janasancaramulla valiyilan
tirccayayum satyavisvasikalkkitil mahattaya atayalamunt
urappayum aikkavasikal akramikalayirunnu
atinal avareyum nam siksiccu. tirccayayum i rantu natukalum turas'saya valiyiltanneyanullat
hijr desakkarum daivadutanmare tallipparannu
namavarkk nam'mute telivukal nalki. ennal avar avaye avaganikkukayayirunnu
avar parvatannalile parakal turann vitukaluntakki. avaravite nirbhayarayi kaliyukayayirunnu
annane oru prabhatavelayil ghearagarjanam avare pitikuti
appeal avar netiyateannum avarkk upakariccilla
akasabhumikaleyum avaykkitayilullavayeyum nam n'yayamaya avasyattinallate srsticcittilla. tirccayayum antyasamayam vannettuka tanne ceyyum. atinal ni vittuvilca kanikkuka. man'yamaya vittuvilca
niscayamayum ninre nathan ellarrineyum srsticcavanan. ellam ariyunnavanum
avartticc parayanam ceyyunna elu suktannal ninakku nam nalkiyittunt. mahattaya i khur'anum
avarile vividha vibhagannalkk nam nalkiya sukhabheagannalil ni kannuvekkentatilla. avarepparri duhkhikkentatumilla. satyavisvasikalkk ni ninre cirak talttikkeatukkuka
ni innane parayukayum ceyyuka: "tirccayayum nan vyaktamaya munnariyippukaran matraman.”
saithilyam srsticcavarkk nam takkitu nalki. atupealeyanitum
khur'ane vyatyasta tattukalakki marriyavaranavar
ninre nathan saksi. avareyeakke nam vicarana ceyyum
avar pravartticcukeantirunnatinepparri
atinal ninneatavasyappettatentea, at urakke prakhyapikkuka. bahudaivavadikale tirttum avaganikkuka
kaliyakkunnavarilninn ninne kakkan nam tanne mati
allahuveateappam marru daivannale sankalpikkunnavaranavar. atinre phalam atuttutanne avarariyum
avar parannuparattunnatu karanam ninre manas's titunnunnuntenn nam ariyunnu
atinal ni ninre nathane kirtticc avanre visud'dhi valttuka. avan pranamamarppikkunnavaril petukayum ceyyuka
ni ninre nathann valippetuka. a urappaya karyam ninakku vannettunvare
